name: Frantic Forrest
description: Frantic Forest is a text based action survival game about a young girl Lily, lost in the forest after going on a camping trip with her parents. As she walks through the forest trying to find the path back to camp she encounters certain enemies and problems. Her problems range from insects, animals, to rockslides. Throughout this game you will have multiple options to choose from, but be warned if the wrong one is chosen it can end in your death. If the right decision is chosen you may earn a reward that will help you later. There will be no hints as to what you can choose, your survival is up to you.
